CustomField.formula: IF(Payer_Location__c = "", Payer_Account__r.BillingStreet & ", " & IF(Payer_Account__r.Billing_Street_Addr2__c = "","", Payer_Account__r.Billing_Street_Addr2__c & ", ") & Payer_Account__r.BillingCity & "," & TEXT(Payer_Account__r.BillingStateCode) & " " & Payer_Account__r.BillingPostalCode, Payer_Location__r.Street__c & ", " & IF(Payer_Location__r.AddressLine2__c = "","", Payer_Location__r.AddressLine2__c & ", ") & Payer_Location__r.City__c & ", " & TEXT(Payer_Location__r.StateProvinceCode__c) & " " & Payer_Location__r.ZipPostalCode__c )
CustomField.label: Payer Address
